Where:

Tamarind Bay Coastal Indian Kitchen and Bistro and Bar
www.tamarind-bay.com

1665 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02445
(617) 277-1752

What:

Spice of the Month Club & Wine Tasting - 4th Tuesday of Every Month ($25/per person).

Come discover the flavors and aromas of spices that are integral to Indian cooking with Master Chef Wali Ahamad. Every 4th Tuesday of the month at Tamarind Bay Coastal, Chef Ahmad will prepare a three course menu (paired with wine) and each item will bring out the dominant flavor of the featured spice. This event is by reservation only and seating is limited.

A wine expert will pair the menu with different wines complimenting the spice profile. All the participants will be served the three course menu along with the wines to taste. Chef Wali will explain the significance of the featured spice in Indian Cuisine and how it can be used to alter or enhance the taste of any dish.
Alongside, the wine expert will talk about pairing wine with the spice.

A great opportunity to interact with Chef Wali Ahmad throughout the event and address any questions you might have about Indian food and spices. At the end of the event, all the participants will be gifted with a specially designed spice box and recipe card to take home.
